仓库说明: Using '/' to seperate Vault & Folder, for example: Vault/Folder1/Folder2
导入选择部分到新仓库: Import selected part to new note
导入选择部分到已有的仓库: Import selected part to exist note
超出长度: Windows system does not allow exporting content longer than the limit (2048 characters), please try reducing the content and then exporting again.
